name: Let's Play with Nanai!
description:
**FULLY LOCALIZED, UNCENSORED**

Let's Play With Nanai! is an adult VR game designed for Oculus Rift/HTC Vive.

In this game, you and Nanai can have sex on the bed in your room, and in few other environment of your choice.

You can change her outfit and her panties, or completely strip her!
Her shy and sweet voice whispers to you - you are her sweetheart!

Just strap a smartphone or Vive/Oculus controller on a body substitute of your choice (such as pillow, love-doll, etc), and Nanai will automatically respond.

YOUR GOAL OF THIS GAME IS MAKING HER CUM!

This type of game has never been made before, so you should absolutely try it.


*Disclaimer*
A character appearing in this game is a 3D digitally generated character, and is intended to be over 18 years old.
